name: Dog Friendly Denver
description: Have you ever wondered what kind of animal you would be and why? Do adorable pictures of cats and dogs melt your heart? If you answered yes to these quesions you need to visit Dog Friendly Denver! The only fun interactive site all about dogs and cats helping link adoptable pets in the Denver area to their forever home!

name: Hotel Motel
description: Hotel Motel is a guest management system designed for small occupancy hotels and motels. The application is simple to use, and allows the user to see all of the guest information and hotel occupancy on one screen.

name: Eat-Da-Burger
description: This application takes in a burger resturaunt order  and allows for them them to devour the burger, yummy!

name: Password Generator
description: Don't sweat trying to come up with a password that contains enough valid numbers, letters, and special characters! Tell this app what you need in a password and let it do the hard work for you.

name: Code Quiz
description: Interactive code quiz that will test your JavaScrip knowledge, better study up!

name: Work Day Scheduler
description: Ever felt overwhelemed keeping up with your busy work schedule? No need to stress! This easy to use day planner will allow you to stay organized.
